XenotypeDef.label: facelessman
XenotypeDef.description: The Faceless Ones' origins are shrouded in mystery, with some claiming they are the byproduct of laboratory experiments in the pursuit of the ultimate human, while others recount that they were selectively bred to serve as stand-ins for dignitaries in public settings. Now, they primarily act as diplomats or spies for various factions, utilizing their extensive internal gene pool to transform into any race. Coupled with their exquisite makeup skills, they can infiltrate any colony or organization and slip away unharmed afterward.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The Faceless Ones are skilled infiltrators, capable of transforming themselves or their minions into any race using their extensive gene pool.
